alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Inland Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:08PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kenedy and eastern Brooks Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 207 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Airport Road Addition, or near Falfurrias, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Falfurrias, Encino, Rachal, Falfurrias Junior High School, Pleasant Park, El Coyote Ranch Airport, Airport Road Addition, Falfurrias Fire Station, Flowella and Brooks County Airport. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 712 and 736. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
